short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your agency prospects and manage them with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Main purpose of this extension is to help markets to increase their leads base. It helps them to generate leads from Google and YellowPages by getting prospects. They can send them email, export them in a CSV and then use auto responder on them. On daily base users can use this tool and its gonna be helpful for them in their marketing business.
